body: Stunner is incredulous over the skin bleaching phenomenon, saying: "Black is beautiful", while Lisa Allen-Agostini "can testify that it is not easy for a black woman to be without a big bottom...the cult of the bamsee is strong."
original_body: Stunner is incredulous over the skin bleaching phenomenon, saying: "Black is beautiful", while Lisa Allen-Agostini "can testify that it is not easy for a black woman to be without a big bottom...the cult of the bamsee is strong."
title: Jamaica, Trinidad & Tobago: Of Beauty & Bottoms
